document_name_accent: ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json
document_title: Ductal carcinoma in situ (DCIS): Symptoms and treatment
subsection_content: Age is getting older; Personal history of premalignant lesions such as atypical hyperplasia; Family history of breast cancer; Never been pregnant.; Having your first child after 30 years old; Having your first period before age 12.; Menopause begins after age 55.; Mutations in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes increase the risk of breast cancer.
subsection_title: ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json. Risk factors for DCIS
subsection_data:
ung thu bieu mo ong tuyen vu tai cho.json. Risk factors for DCIS
Age is getting older; Personal history of premalignant lesions such as atypical hyperplasia; Family history of breast cancer; Never been pregnant.; Having your first child after 30 years old; Having your first period before age 12.; Menopause begins after age 55.; Mutations in the BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes increase the risk of breast cancer.
